title: Kim Kardashian And Kendall Jenner Laughed At By Emmy Awards Audience
text:
Kim Kardashian and Kendall Jenner got laughs as presenters at the Emmy Awards on Sunday ― but the joke appeared to be on them.

The two were about to hand out the award for Outstanding Reality TV when Kardashian, the star of “Keeping Up With The Kardashians,” said: “Our family knows firsthand how truly compelling television comes from real people just being themselves.”

Jenner chimed in: “Telling their stories unfiltered and unscripted.”

The audience could be heard laughing at their spiel. Some outlets reported that the two appeared annoyed at the reaction, but that isn’t so clear on the replay.

There was awkward audience laughter when Kim Kardashian and Kendall Jenner said their family tells their stories "unfiltered and unscripted." Yikes. #Emmys2019 pic.twitter.com/H6XH3g6L1L — Ryan Schocket (@RyanSchocket) September 23, 2019

There is also a chance that Kim K and Kendall were in on the joke ― or were at least self-aware enough to see the humor in their remarks.

Comedian Kathy Griffin, who said she used to live next door to Kardashian and husband Kanye West, told “Entertainment Tonight” (in the segment above) that the Emmys audience did indeed laugh. Don’t shed any tears for Kim K and crew, though. “They get laughed at and go home and count their money,” the comic said.

Check out the Twitter reactions here:

Wait did the audience just laugh at the Kardashians?! #Emmys pic.twitter.com/AF8GPBbZ9M — Elizabeth Holme’s Real Voice (@TheTerriDiaries) September 23, 2019

Did they just laugh at Kim Kardashian and Kendall Jenner? Kendall’s face seemed annoyed. How sad. #Emmys — armando (@mialterego) September 23, 2019

Did the #Emmys audience just laugh at Kim Kardashian? I don't think she was telling a joke. pic.twitter.com/JvUdZLPSAh — David Onda (@David_Onda) September 23, 2019

It was very rude & wasn't necessary for the audience to laugh at @KimKardashian & @KendallJenner. 😡 #Emmy2019 — Sheena McRae (@sheenamcrae) September 23, 2019

Did everyone just laugh after The Kardashians after said something how they “are just being themselves?” Haha



So awkward. #Emmys2019 pic.twitter.com/2bcWjZVVBl — 𝕋𝕙𝕖𝕄𝕖𝕤𝕤𝕪𝕄𝕚𝕟𝕕𝕠𝕗𝕄𝕖 (@MessyMindofMe) September 23, 2019

how rude and unprofessional of the crowd? Who’s lame idea was it to burst out laughing as they present an award?? People are so low and not respectful at all. These girls don’t deserve more than half of the hate they get from people seriously...grow tf up #Emmys2019 pic.twitter.com/xeBNs9gLb7 — kendallnicole.style (@KendallNStyle) September 23, 2019

We always laugh at the true geniuses ahead of their time https://t.co/PJblbI0Afy #Emmys — The Blemish (@theblemish) September 23, 2019

Success and Smile are the best revenge for the haters @KimKardashian @KendallJenner . Make them more mad and jealous to your mega successful life. Those people who laugh are the kind of people who jealous, broke and ugly https://t.co/JsNZv8NR6K — Joshane Kardash (@joshanekardash) September 23, 2019

How about the whole audience just cackling at the idea of the Kardashians being real... even Kim knew it was funny #Emmys pic.twitter.com/i78NRYnGU5 — Ria (@BarstoolRia) September 23, 2019

I can't be the only one who heard the audience laugh when Kim Kardashian and Kendall Jenner were presenting? Am I? #Emmys — Milly Cabrera (@OfficeMilly) September 23, 2019

Very satisfying watching a room full of people openly laugh in the Kardashians faces — The Dudemeister (@BeyondInception) September 23, 2019

description: The star-studded audience seemed to mock the reality-show presenters’ speech about “real people just being themselves.”
